summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3915 for the improvement of West 48th Street from 1st Avenue Northwest to 2nd Avenue Northwest; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47665, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
